description:
Tommy has a sexy bad boy vibe about him.
I was hoping he might want to do some guy-on-guy work, but we only talked about a solo. There is a small chance he might come back to do more.
He has done some video work before, but mostly he has been photographed by a lot of photographers. Tommy was a joy to do photos with as he just knew how to move and pose.
He was also confident nude, and with his nearly 8-inch cock, we can see why.
Tommy jerks-off sensually, and even does a great job showing-off his ass.
He has a terrific cum shot, totally coating his abs with his jizz. Tasty!
title: Tommy - Solo
